revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 86:;(Epeiph) 29 likewise:;Karanos, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Imouthes, mother Tapetsiris, drachmas 4;;Limnaios, son of Onnophris, grandson of Satabous, mother Ptolema, copper drachmas 4;;Mysthes the younger, son of Dioskoros, grandson of Mysthes, mother Tepheros, drachmas 20;;Ptolemaios, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Horos, mother Eserempis, drachmas 20;;Ptolemais, daughter of Apollonios (Ischyras, chief of police);;orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 17 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 2 obols 2.5 chalki 2, naubion drachma 1 chalki 3.5, surcharges drachmas 4 obols 2.5;;(in left margin: drachmas 40) eparourion drachmas 11 obols 3, surcharges drachma 1, kollybos obols 3, in total drachmas 39 obols 2.5 chalki 2;;Paoueites, son of Petheus, grandson of Phasis, mother Tapetheus, copper drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Thaisas, copper drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Onnophris (wife of Petenas ?);;orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 2 obols 2 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obols 2.5 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 4;;(in left margin: drachmas 36 obols 16) eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 4 chalki 2;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 5 obols 5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 2 chalki 2, in total drachmas 6 obol 1.5;;and to Akousarion, son of Euhemeros through the agency of Tapetheus, daughter of Euhemeros;;orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1.5, in total drachmas 11 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 12 obols 3, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 13 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;Chairemon, son of Horos, grandson of Onnophris, mother Segathis, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Petheus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tapasion, obols 28;;Aphrodisios, son of Anchophis, grandson of Petheus, mother Melanous, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Phanomgeus, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tamystha, copper drachmas 4;;Heron, son of Horos, grandson of Petheus, mother Taharpagathes, drachmas 12;;Panesneus, son of Ischyras, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaesis, copper drachmas 8;;Sarapion, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Sarapion, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4 obols 20 copper drachmas 4 obols 8;;Petheus, son of Kanis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Kanis, cultivator in the 70th cleruchy;;orchard taxes of year 12 in the dioikesis of Patsontisapomoira drachma 1 obol 1.5, naubion obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 28) eparourion obols 5, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 2 obols 4;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 3 obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 3 obols 2;;rent of year 12 drachmas 8, surcharges obols 3, in total drachmas 8 obols 3;;Lucius Antonius Pomp()anus (Marinus, son of Kelaulis);;(in left margin: drachmas 64) orchard taxes of year 12 drachmas 4 obol 0.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 3.5 chalki 2, naubion obols 2.5, surcharges drachma 1 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 2 obols 4 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1.5, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 9 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 7, surcharges obols 3, in total drachmas 7 obols 3;;and Marcus Sempronius Clemens through the agency of Marinus;;orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 8 obols 4.5, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obol 1.5, naubion obols 5.5, surcharges drachmas 2 obol 1 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 5 obols 5, surcharges obols 3, kollybos obols 2, in total drachmas 19 obols 4.5 chalki 2;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 21 obols 5 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1 obols 2.5, in total drachmas 23 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;naubion of katoikoi of year 13 drachmas 2 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachmas 2 obol 1.5 chalki 2."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- BL III, 113 (on l. 8 a.o) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
